title: Brandr
description: BRANDRThey forced her on me, I thought I didn't want a woman to call my own but she is now the light that guides me. She was tortured, nearly killed all because of me. I will go to the ends of the earth to make them pay, they will know never to mess with the Elemental's MC again.ARIAMy life changed from one day to another now he is the only one that calms my mind. I know Iâ€™m still in danger but Brandr and the MC will protect me.BRANDR is a steamy possessive, bad boy alpha male romance with guaranteed HEA, no cheating, and no cliffhanger! This book is the third book in the Elemental's MC series
author: Alexi Ferreira
